
{{alias}}( operation )
    Returns the diagonal type string associated with a supported BLAS
    diagonal type value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    operation: any
        Operation value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string|null
        Operation string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'unit' )
    'unit'
    > out = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/blas/base/diagonal-type-str2enum}}( 'unit' ) )
    'unit'

    See Also
    --------
